original_text: Some time later, King Xerxes was not feeling so angry. He thought about Vashti and what she had done. He remembered the law that he had made, that she should not be queen any more.
korean_text: 그 후에 아하수에로 왕의 노가 그치매 와스디와 그가 행한 일과 그에 대하여 내린 조서를 생각하거늘

sentences.original_text: King Xerxes was not feeling so angry
sentences.korean_translation: 크셀크세스 왕은 더 이상 화가 나지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: that she should not be queen any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 더 이상 왕비가 될 수 없다는
